title: GG jacquard wool sweater
description: Ease into the new season with stylish knitwear like this lightweight sweater from Gucci. It's made in Italy from wool and features an all-over GG jacquard motif for enviable recognition.

title: Technical pants
description: These pants from Giorgio Armani are made from technical shell that's padded for insulation and resistant to water and wind. They have multiple zippered pockets and a straight cut.

title: Rhyton GG canvas sneakers
description: Defined by contrasting fabrics and colors, Gucci’s Spring/Summer '22 collection showcased irresistible designs that spoke to retro-inspired glamour. This reiteration of the Rhyton sneakers is made from GG Supreme canvas with tonal trims and soles.

title: x Adidas Triple S sneakers
description: Step out in style in the Triple S hybrid sneakers from the Balenciaga x Adidas collaboration. Presented in a label-signature chunky silhouette, the pair sit atop logo-embossed rubber soles and are detailed with a signature stripe motif.

title: Tasseled patent leather loafers
description: Gucci’s penchant for nostalgic design is spotlighted by these patent leather loafers. Appearing with tasseled vamps, this style has gold-toned lettering to the stacked heels and round toes.

title: Embellished leather knee-high boots
description: These knee-high boots from Gucci are accented with gold-tone branded buttons and lace-up detailing on the front. The style is made from black leather and has a practical heel loop.

title: Horsebit jacquard loafer
description: One of Gucci's most powerful emblems, the Horsebit points to the house's storied fascination with equestrian design codes. These classic loafers feature a black Horsebit jacquard pattern and gold-tone hardware.

title: Thread Slick canvas ankle boots
description: With oversized rubber soles, these high-top Alexander McQueen sneakers have a lace-up design, a debossed rubber logo on the sides and branding on the pull-tabs.

title: Sprint leather sneakers
description: Fit to conquer any terrain, Alexander McQueen's Sprint sneakers sit on wide, chunky runner soles that run up the heels. They're made from leather, suede, and mesh panels with an appliqued Seal logo on the side.

title: Technical holdall bag
description: Made from lightweight, hard-wearing technical fabric with leather accents, this black holdall is printed with Giorgio Armani’s logo and has a double zip fastening. It sits on polished silver studs, ready for your next getaway.

title: x Foot The Coacher leather Chelsea boots
description: Auralee updates the classic Chelsea style in collaboration with Foot The Coacher. The pair is crafted from black calfskin, fitted with side gussets resting on rugged Vibram soles, and features a slightly squared toe.

title: x Foot The Coacher leather sandals
description: Made in collaboration with Foot The Coacher, these leather sandals from Auralee have slingback ankle straps and ridged rubber soles.

title: Leather Derby shoes
description: These leather Derby shoes from Giorgio Armani are a classic with a modern twist. This pair is designed without laces so they can be easily slipped on and are made in Italy from brushed leather that has a high-shine finish.

title: Canvas sneakers
description: Made from canvas with leather trims, these sneakers from Giorgio Armani are set on rubber soles and have lace-up fronts.

title: La Greca Signature tote bag
description: This sizeable Versace tote bag is patterned with the La Greca Signature print all over. It's made from faux leather and edged with leather trims. Notice the complementary pouch and protective caps along the base.

title: Buckled sandals
description: Balancing function and style, these hiking sandals from Giorgio Armani are made in Italy from technical fabric They are finished with black buckles and feature embossed branding on the midsole.

title: Greca Labyrinth leather Derby shoes
description: For a style to take your workwear uniform up a notch, opt for the Greca Labyrinth Derby shoes from Versace. They're crafted from smooth, shiny leather with wide rubber Greca motif midsoles.

title: Explorer leather backpack
description: The Explorer backpack is crafted in Italy from smooth lambskin leather and softly padded shoulder straps. The practical design is given a streetwear edge with a graffiti print and matte black hardware.

title: Barocco espadrilles
description: Featuring the brand's iconic print, Versace's Barocco espadrilles make a bold statement. They're made from cotton canvas with jute midsoles and ultra-comfortable leather insoles.

title: La Greca Signature pouch
description: Versace’s La Greca Signature pattern is inspired by the house’s decadent heritage. This pouch bag features logo plaque lettering, a wrist loop, and a detachable shoulder strap for versatile carrying options.

title: Medusa slides
description: Versace's Medusa slides feature a playful style that's reminiscent of the '90s. Cut from rubber with leather detailing, they're set on comfortable soles and topped off with iconic gold-toned hardware.

title: La Medusa leather loafers
description: This iteration of Versace's La Medusa loafers is distinguished by its moccasin-like stitching. The smooth leather uppers are embellished with the iconic Medusa hardware and rest atop La Greca rubber soles.

title: Triple S sneakers
description: In the iconic oversized shape, these multicolored Triple S sneakers from Balenciaga have mesh and faux-leather upper inserts. They're complete with an embroidered style number on the cap and logo on the side.

title: Medusa embellished leather crossbody bag
description: Made in Italy from smooth black leather, this Versace crossbody bag has a detachable shoulder strap and a gleaming gold-toned Medusa adorning the front.

title: Nylon crossbody bag
description: Giorgio Armani employs its signature clean-cut aesthetic in the design of this functional crossbody bag. Made from durable nylon, this bag has a removable shoulder strap, leather detailing, and an unexpected interior logo print.

title: The Harness nylon backpack
description: This backpack from Alexander McQueen is designed with brand signature Harness cross-over detailing on the front. Made from nylon, it's lightweight and a practical option for every day.

title: Leather-trimmed canvas shoulder bag
description: Giorgio Armani elevates this highly functional design with leather detailing and a colorful interior. This canvas bag has an accessible snap-button closure, secure buckle fastening, and both a backpack and shoulder strap for increased versatility.

title: BB Signature canvas tote bag
description: This large tote bag is made from coated canvas with a jacquard rendition of Balenciaga's BB Signature monogram. It has antiqued golden hardware, leather trims and interior pockets for organization.

title: Leather crossbody bag
description: This crossbody bag from Balenciaga is crafted from leather, fastening with a silver zip at the top. Featuring the brand's name at every angle, this style has an adjustable shoulder strap and is fully lined.

title: The Grip leather tote bag
description: The Grip tote bag from Alexander McQueen takes its name from the metal handles that adorn the top edge of this style. Crafted from leather with contrast stitching, this piece has an internal card slot and phone pocket.

title: Medusa necklace
description: This antique gold-tone necklace from Versace will add edge to any ensemble. Constructed in Italy with a slender chain-link strap, it is centered by a round Greca-framed pendant embellished with the house’s iconic Medusa-head hardware.

title: Greca leather card holder
description: Store your essentials safely in Versace's compact yet eye-catching Greca card holder. Accented with the label's iconic motif, it's made in Italy from calf leather with a zipped pocket and a money clip.

title: La Medusa leather belt
description: Versace injects its signature magnetism into everyday essentials, beginning with this calf leather belt. Cut to an angular end, the understated design is elevated with the brand's silver-toned Medusa hardware.

title: Padded hood
description: This hood showcases Stone Island’s cult streetwear status. This padded piece is made from iridescent Nylon Metal fabric, formed by ECONYL® regenerated nylon, and has a 6-panel crown, frontal storm flap, and breathable inlay.

title: Ribbed-knit wool beanie
description: In a vivid hue, this ribbed-knit beanie from Stone Island has a wide brim embroidered with the brand's logo patch. Woven in Italy, it is made entirely from wool.

title: Padded nylon bucket hat
description: Whatever the weather, this Stone Island bucket hat is forever an option with its insulating padding. Made from green regenerated nylon, it’s finished with adjustable drawcords, a detachable rim at the back, and iconic logo embroidery.

title: Shearling and suede hat
description: This tactile hat is from Giorgio Armani's Neve winter capsule collection. It's made from supremely cozy shearling with a smooth suede-paneled crown.

title: Logo cashmere scarf
description: This rectangular scarf from Giorgio Armani is made from pure cashmere in a neutral hue and accented with the label’s jacquard logo in brown, a color block strip, and ribbed knit detailing.

title: Round glasses
description: These round glasses from Armani Eyewear are made from metal, making them both durable and lightweight. The timeless design combines tortoiseshell-effect coating and silver-toned metal.

title: Cotton terry bucket hat
description: This brown bucket hat is made entirely from organically-certified cotton. Auralee collaborates with celebrated hatmaker, Kijima Takayuki, for this minimalist design.

title: BB Icon ring
description: This chunky ring from Balenciaga boldly displays the brand's BB Icon logo. Made in Italy, the brass design has an antique gold finish.
